info

Class Lock

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.Lock

  • public class Lock
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the information needed to manage a lock for a review report. An instance of this class is needed for each peer review report.

    • Field Summary

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        iProposalNumber - proposal number
        iPanelName - panel name
        iType - type of review report for this lock
        iPath - directory path for lock files

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()

      • lock

        public boolean lock(java.lang.String userName,
                    int userID)
        Creates a lock for the specified user
        Parameters:
        userName - user creating lock
        userID - pers_id of user creating lock
        Returns:
        boolean true if lock created

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock(java.lang.String userName)
        This routine deletes the lock file associated with a report.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name to unlock
        Returns:
        boolean true if lock successfully deleted

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock()
        This routine deletes the lock file associated with a report.
        Returns:
        boolean true if lock successfully deleted

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        This routine checks if a lock exists for this report
        Returns:
        boolean true if lock exists

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked(java.lang.String userName)
        This routine checks if a lock exists for this report by other than the specified user.
        Parameters:
        userName - name of user
        Returns:
        boolean true if lock exists for other than this user on this report

      • whoLocked

        public java.lang.String whoLocked()
        This routine finds who locked the current report
        Returns:
        String name of user who locked the current report or null

      • whoLocked

        public java.lang.String whoLocked(int lockFileUserId)
        This routine finds who locked the current report
        Parameters:
        lockFileUserId - set to the user id of the current lock
        Returns:
        String name of user who locked the current report or null

      • getLockFilename

        private java.lang.String getLockFilename()
        This routine will create the filename which is by panel,proposal number type of report with a .LOCK extension
        Returns:
        String name of lock file

        private boolean isOldLock()
